channel.title: Phillips County|Montana|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Phillips County|Montana|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-2 West - Entering Fort Belknap Indian Reservation
item.description: Entering Fort Belknap Indian Reservation on US-2 west.

item.title: US-2 West at MTS-363 South
item.description: US-2 West at MTS-363 South to Wagner. Continue west on US-2 for Havre.

item.title: US-2 West/US-191 North at US-191 North
item.description: US-2 West/US-191 North at US-191 North in Malta.

item.title: US-2 West/US-191 North at US-191 North
item.description: US-2 West/US-191 North at US-191 North in Malta.

item.title: US-2 West/US-191 North at US-2/US-191 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-191 North at US-2/US-191 split. Turn right for US-191 north to Loring and Swift Current (SK, Canada).

item.title: US-2 West/US-191 North - Milk River
item.description: US-2 West/US-191 North crossing the Milk River

item.title: US-2 West Approaching US-191
item.description: US-2 west approaching US-191 in Malta.

item.title: US-2 West - Malta
item.description: Entering Malta on US-2 west. Malta is the county seat of Phillips County.

item.title: US-2 West at US-191
item.description: US-2 west at US-191 south to Lewistown. Continue east on US-2 to Havre. US-191 joins US-2 west through Malta.
